game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time has no meaning, the fabric of reality is threatened by a mysterious force known as "The Devourer". Players take on the role of an immortal being, tasked with exploring ancient ruins, solving puzzles, and uncovering the secrets behind The Devourer's existence.
game.beginning: The game begins in a desolate, timeless realm where the player's character awakens with no memories of their past. As they explore the world, they discover cryptic messages and ancient artifacts that hint at a long-lost civilization.
game.ending: After unraveling the mysteries of The Devourer, the player must confront the true source of the threat: a powerful entity from another dimension. Depending on the choices made throughout the game, the ending can unfold in multiple ways, ranging from a catastrophic reset of time to a hopeful new beginning for the world.
